titleStmt.title: Davids prayer for Solomon, containing the proper endowments and duty royall of a king, with the consequent blessings upon a kingdome. Delivered in a sermon at Christ-Church London, before the Right Honourable the Lord Major, the right worshipfull the aldermen his bretheren, together with the worshipfull companies of the said city, upon the 27th. of March, 1643. Being the commemoration of his Majesties inauguration. By Joseph Caryl, preacher to the Honourable Society of Lincolnes Inne. It is this present eight day of Aprill, anno Domini, 1643. Ordered by the Committee of the House of Commons in Parliament concerning printing, that this sermon intituled (Davids Prayer for Solomon, containing, the proper endowments and duty royall of a King, &c.) be printed and published. John White.
titleStmt.author: Caryl, Joseph, 1602-1673.

England and Wales. Parliament.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by G. M. for Giles Calvert, and are to be sould by Christopher Meredith at the Crane in Pauls Church-yard,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
